meanings.definition: Carry out a systematic or formal inquiry to discover and examine the facts of (an incident, allegation, etc.) so as to establish the truth.
meanings.sent1: The detective is investigating the mysterious disappearance of the valuable necklace.
meanings.sent2: The police are investigating the crime scene for any clues.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat was investigating the new box in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a detective, constantly investigating every detail.
meanings.sent5: The scientist was investigating the behavior of ants in the colony.

meanings.definition: Search for and gather information about (someone or something) in order to determine their true nature or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: She was investigating the strange noise coming from the basement.
meanings.sent2: The journalist is investigating the background of the famous actor.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was investigating the contents of her toy box.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like magnifying glasses, investigating every movement.
meanings.sent5: The explorer was investigating the hidden treasures of the jungle.
